about_the_game:
JOIN THE CLUB ON DISCORD

WILL YOU BE THE FIRST?

Tight turns, dizzying loops, and steep drops... Are you ready to finish the race in first place? Take down your opponents with a variety of power-ups and soar through the air to carefully selected music. Whether you're training solo or dominating online races, you'll have a blast in this fast-paced futuristic world.

POWER-UP

They are the key to victory. In each race, you can obtain them randomly by passing through item boxes scattered throughout the tracks.

LEVELS

The competitive rankings in GAME HOVER start at the plastic rank, followed by bronze, silver, and beyond. Each rank is represented by distinctive helmets.

By winning competitive races, you will be promoted to higher divisions and ranks. Track your progress in real-time on the overall leaderboard.

EVOLVING CONTENT

  • New tracks regularly during updates

  • New skins each season

  • An exclusive game mode every season

TEAM

We are a French studio with the ambition to create a franchise that stands out through its authenticity, connection with the community, and disruption of traditional video game industry norms. Our philosophy is to have a positive impact, transcend age groups, embrace our cultural influences, and work on open-source solutions to improve the video game industry.

For club members, we will regularly organize special events that blend gaming, food, and music in unique locations around the world.

JOIN THE CLUB BY CONNECTING TO THE DISCORD SERVER AND PARTICIPATE ACTIVELY IN THE GAME'S EVOLUTION.
